items.title: iRobot’s revenue has tanked and it’s almost out of cash
items.summary: Things continue to look bleak for the original robot vacuum maker. iRobot’s third-quarter results, released last week, show that revenue is down and “well below our internal expectations due to continuing market headwinds, ongoing production delays, and unforeseen shipping disruptions,” said Gary Cohen, iRobot CEO, in a press release. This meant they had to spend […]

items.title: Anker’s 2025 Black Friday Warm Up sale now live: Up to 48% off latest Prime and Nano chargers, blind boxes, more
items.summary:
Anker has officially kicked off its 2025 early Black Friday sale with markdowns on everything from its latest Prime charging stations to Nano chargers, MagSafe stands, cables, and more. The event runs through November 20 before its full-fledged Black Friday sale kicks off, unlocking early Black Friday prices that are mostly matched at Amazon. These offers are joined by blind boxes with charging gear worth up to $4,799. Notably, you can even secure a $30 credit ahead of the full Black Friday sale starting November 21. The details on the Anker Black Friday Warm Up sale event await below.

more…

items.title: Protesters force delay to opening of Nigeria's new art museum
items.summary: The protesters are angry that the area's traditional ruler is not involved in the new museum.

items.title: EcoFlow’s latest 48-hour flash sale offers the DELTA 2 Max + 800W alternator charger at $1,099 (Reg. $1,899+), more
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing early Black Friday Sale, EcoFlow has launched the next of its 48-hour flash sales that is taking up to 60% off four units. A great option in the lineup is the DELTA 2 Max Portable Power Station bundled with an 800W alternator charger at $1,099 shipped, which beats Amazon’s pricing by $800. This package carries a $2,498 MSRP, though it’s more often seen down at $1,899 over at Amazon, with discounts this year having gone as low as $1,049 during last month’s Prime Day event. The flash sale here cuts $800 off the going rate (and $1,399 off the MSRP), landing it at the second-lowest price we have tracked. If you are looking for the power station alone, you can score it without the alternator charger at $899 shipped, with that price matching at Amazon. Head below for more on this and the other bundles seeing discounts through November 11.

more…

items.title: US Senate compromise sets stage for end to government shutdown
items.summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -The longest government shutdown in U.S. history could end this week after a compromise that would restore federal funding cleared an initial Senate hurdle late on Sunday, though it was unclear when Congress would give its final approval. Read full story

While the newer 240W models rarely ever hit the bargain bins, the 2-meter model did just hit the Amazon all-time low at $18 with free shipping for Prime members or in orders over $35.

items.title: Nord Stream suspect held in Italy refusing food due to health condition, lawyer says
items.summary: MILAN (Reuters) -A Ukrainian man suspected of coordinating the 2022 sabotage of the Nord Stream gas pipelines has gone on hunger strike because Italian authorities are violating his fundamental rights by ignoring his poor health condition, his lawyer said on Monday. Read full story

items.title: Anker’s full SOLIX early Black Friday Sale takes up to 65% off stations with four tiers of FREE gifts starting from $158
items.summary:
After last week’s early-bird Doorbusters gave us a brief and limited look at some holiday savings, Anker SOLIX has now launched its full early Black Friday Sale with up to 65% discounts and four tiers of FREE gifts at certain purchase thresholds of $2,500 and more. Among the lineup, we spotted the F3800 Plus Portable Power Station dropping down to $2,499 shipped and getting a FREE protective cover ($160 value), which is currently unavailable at Amazon. Carrying a $4,799 MSRP and usually keeping around $3,899 these days, we saw this newer modular backup power solution taken as low as $2,599 during this year’s Prime Day events and in last week’s Doorbuster deals. With the full sale kicking off, folks are getting an additional $100 shaved from the tag for a total $1,560+ in savings at a new all-time low price.

items.title: Canada loses measles elimination status after three decades, health agency says
items.summary: OTTAWA (Reuters) -Canada has lost its measles elimination status after nearly three decades due to its failure to curb a year-long outbreak, the country's public health agency said on Monday, a loss that also results in the Americas region losing the status. Read full story

items.title: Tap into iPhone 17’s fast charging for just $11 today with this Baseus 45W USB-C adapter (56% off)
items.summary:
Baseus 45W PicoGo C1 USB-C charger

Buy for $11 (Reg. $25)

Enter promo code YIU99IT6 for 32% off.

What we love

Apple’s iPhone 17 can hit 50% in about 20 minutes with a 40W+ adapter, and this Baseus Picogo charger delivers those speeds for a solid price today. Its ultra-compact design makes it easy to carry, and the single USB-C port outputs up to 45W for fast, reliable charging. It’s hard to go wrong with this unit at the discounted price.

items.title: Eight killed in car explosion near Red Fort in India's Delhi
items.summary: NEW DELHI (Reuters) -At least eight people were killed on Monday in a car explosion near the historic Red Fort in a densely populated area of the Indian capital Delhi, a police spokesperson said, a rare blast in the heavily guarded city of more than 30 million people. items.title: Why a lot of people are getting hacked with government spyware
items.summary: Government surveillance vendors want us to believe their spyware products are only used in limited and targeted operations against terrorists and serious criminals. That claim is increasingly difficult to justify, given the broad range of victims — journalists, activists, and now political consultants — that have come forward.
